titleStmt.title: Scriptural readings for the Night Hours / Rǝʾya taʾammǝr, Vision of St John the Evangelist about the Miracles of Mary / Maṣḥafa gǝṣṣǝw, Lectionary for the entire year

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: I) Scriptural readings for the Night Hours (fols. 3ra-6vb) I-1) 5th Hour (fols. 3ra-4ra) I-2) 6th Hour (fols. 4ra-6ra) I-3) 9th Hour (fols. 6ra-6vb) II) Rәʾәyä täʾamәr, Vision of St John the Evangelist about the Miracles of Mary (fols. 6vb-22va) III) Maṣḥafa gәṣṣәw, Lectionary for the entire year (fols. 22va-116ra) III-1) Scriptural readings for liturgical periods, fasts and feasts (for the entire year) (fols. 22va-80vb; 109rb-116ra) - Liturgical period Yoḥannәs: fols. 22va-24rb - Liturgical period Fәre: fols. 24rb-25va - Liturgical period Masqal: fols. 25va-27rb - Liturgical period Ṣәge: fols. 27rb-28rb - Liturgical period Mäḍäw: fols. 28rb-29vb - Liturgical period ʾAstämḥәro: fols. 29vb-31rb - Liturgical period Sәbkät: fols. 31rb-33va - Liturgical period Bәrhan: fols. 33va-33vb - Liturgical period Nolawi: fols. 33vb-34va - Liturgical period Lәdät: fols. 34va-36ra - Feast of the Epiphany (Ṭәmqәt): fols. 36ra-37rb - Vigil of a feast (Wāzemā): fols. 37rb-38vb - Feast dedicated to Mary (bäʿalä Māryām): fols. 38vb-41ra - Feast dedicated to the Son (bäʿalu Wald, sic): fols. 41ra-41vb - Feast of the Circumcision (Gәzrät): fols. 41vb-42rb - 8th Sunday before Easter, Sunday of “He who descended…” (za-wärädä…) or “of the Encounter with the Fast” (Qäbbäla ṣom): fols. 42rb-44ra - 7th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Holy” (Qәddәst): fols. 44ra-45va - 6th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Temple” (Mәkʷәrab): fols. 45va-46vb - 5th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Paralytic” (Mäḍagʷәʿ): fols. 46vb-42rb - 4th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Mount of Olives” (Dabra Zayt): fols. 42rb-50vb - 3rd Sunday before Easter, Sunday of the “Good Servant” (Gәbәr ḫer): fols. 50vb-53rb - Palm Sunday (Hosaʿәna): fols. 53rb-55ra - Resurrection (Tәnśaʾe): fols. 55ra-57vb - Liturgical period of the Resurrection (za-zämäna Tәnśaʾe): fols. 57vb-59vb - Ascension (ʿƎrgät): fols. 59vb-61rb - Pentecost (Ṗaraqliṭos): fols. 61rb-63ra - Fast of the Apostles (Ḥawāryāt): fols. 63ra-64vb - Liturgical period Kәrämt (“Rainy season”): fols. 64vb-66vb - Feast of the Trinity (Śәllāse): fols. 66vb-68va - Transfiguration (Dabra Tabor): fols. 68va-70ra - Feast of the Circumcision (Gәzrät): fols. 70ra-70vb - Feasts of the Righteous Ones and Martyrs (Ṣadәqan wa-Samāʿtāt): fols. 70vb-73ra - Feats of Angels (Mälaʾәkt): fols. 73ra-75va - Daily readings (za-wätr): fols. 75va-76vb - Sundays (sänabәt): fols. 76vb-78va - Fast of Nineveh (Nänäwi): fols. 78va-78vb - Feast of the Mountain of Zion (Ṣәyon): fols. 78vb-79rb - Feast of the Wedding of Cana (Qana za-Gälila): fols. 79rb-79vb - Feast of the Upbringing (Ḥәnḍät): fols. 79vb-80vb - Feast of the Bridegroom (Märʿawi): fols. 109rb-111rb - Liturgical period of the Revelation (za-zamana ʾAstärʾәyo): fols. 111rb-112vb - Feast of Melchizedek (Mälkä Ṣәdәq): fols. 112vb-115ra - For the Mass (Qәddase): fols. 115ra-115vb - Explicit: fols. 115vb-116ra III-2) Scriptural readings for the days of the week (fols. 80vb-109rb) - Monday (sänuy): fols. 80vb-83va; 94vb-96va - Tuesday (śälus): fols. 83va-85ra; 96va-98rb - Wednesday (räbuʿ): fols. 85ra-86va; 98rb-100ra - Thursday (ḥamus): fols. 86va-88va - Friday (ʾarb): fols. 88va-90vb; 100ra-101vb - Saturday (qadāmit): fols. 90vb-92rb; 101vb-109rb - Sunday (ʾǝḥud): fols. 92rb-94vb Additio 1.

msItem.note: Text III is called Maṣḥafa gǝṣṣǝw in the explicit (s. 115vb).

supportDesc.extent: Made of 116.0 folios, of which 3.0 blank fols. 1, 2, 116v, in 15.0 quires (A+14). 225 165 65

list.item: 8 VI፮(8; s.l. 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 43r-50v)

10
XI፲፩(10; s.l. 3, stub after 8; 8, stub after 3/fols. 83r-92v)
8 XIII፲፫(8; s.l. 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 101r-108v)

layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

handNote.seg: Nomina sacra; names of the donors; incipit of Text I and its sections; first two lines of Text II and its sections; first two lines of Text III-1; first two lines of Text III-2; titles of books to be read; directives to the ministers; the word barǝkännä, “bless us” in Text I-2 (fols. 5rb-6ra); abbreviation of the directives yǝbǝl kahǝn, “the priest says”, yǝbǝl diyaqon, “the deacon says” and yǝbǝl ḥǝzb, “the people say” in Text III-2 (fol. 83ra); elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals. On the incipit page of Texts I, III-1 and III-2 (fols. 3r, 22va, 80vb) a few lines are rubricated (alternating with black lines). On fol. 103rb, a few lines are rubricated (alternating with black lines).

item.quote: 116rb: በ፲ወ፱፻ወ፴፡ አመተ፡ ምሕረት፡ ዝመጽሐፍ፡ ግጽው፡ ዘወሀብዎ፡ ሃለቃ፡ ተፈሪ፡ ሃለቃ፡ ግርማይ፡ ለታቦተ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ መጥምቅ፡ ደብላ፡ ከመ፡ ይኩኖሙ፡ መርሐ፡ ለመንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፡ አሜን። ዘሠረቆ፡ ወዘፈሐቆ፡ ውጉዞ፡ ለይኩን፡ በሥልጣነ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ወበሥልጣኑ፡ ለዮሐንስ፡ ወለቃለ፡ ፲ወ፪፡ ሐዋርያት፡ አሜን፡ ወአሜን።
item.note: The names of the donors, haläqa Täfäri and haläqa Gǝrmay, the date of the donation, 1930 A.M. (=1937/38 A.D.) and the name of the church which received the donation, Yoḥannǝs Maṭmǝq Dǝbla, are mentioned.

list.item: - Unreadable stamp: 2v. - Crude drawings of crosses in pencil: 2r-2v. - Pen trials: 2r-2v.

item.desc: - Finely decorated notes written in the upper margin indicate assigned readings for Text III in fols.: ዘዮሐንስ: fol. 22va ዘፍሬ፡ fol. 24rb ዘመስቀል: fol. 25va ዘጽጌ: fol. 27rb ዘመጸው፡ fol. 28rb ዘኣስተምሕሮ፡ fol. 29vb ዘስብከት፡ 31rb ዘብርሃን፡ fol. 33va ዘኖላዊ፡ fol. 33vb ዘልደት፡ fol. 34va ዘጥምቅት፡ fol. 36ra ዘዋዜማ፡ fol. 37rb ዘበዓለ፡ ማርያም፡ fol. 38vb ዘበዓሉ፡ ወልድ፡ fol. 41ra ዘግዝረት፡ fol. 41 vb ዘወረደ፡ fol. 42rb ዘቅድስት፡ fol. 44ra ዘምክውራብ፡ fol. 45va ዘመፃግውዕ፡ fol. 46vb ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት፡ fol. 42rb ዘገብር፡ ኄር፡ fol. 50vb ዘሆሣዕና፡ fol. 53rb ዘትንሣኤ፡ fol. 55ra ዘዘመና፡ ትንሣኤ፡ fol. 57vb ዘዕርገት፡ fol. 59vb ዘጳራቅሊጦስ፡ fol. 61rb ዘሐዋርያት፡ fol. 63ra ዘክረምት፡ fol. 64vb ዘሥላሴ፡ fol. 66vb ዘደብረ፡ ታቦር፡ fol. 68va ዘግዝረት፡ fol. 70ra ዘጻድቃን፡ ወሰማዕት፡ fol. 70vb ዘመላእክት፡ fol. 73ra ዘዘወትር፡ fol. 75va ዘሰናብት፡ fol. 76vb ዘነነዊ፡ fol. 78va ዘጽዮን፡ fol. 78vb ዘቃና፡ ዘገሊላ፡ fol. 79rb ዘሕንፀት፡ fol. 79vb ዘሰኑይ፡ fols. 80vb; 94vb ዘሠሉስ፡ fols. 83va; 96va ዘረቡዕ፡ fols. 85ra; 98rb ዘሐሙስ፡ fol. 86va ዘኣርብ፡ fols. 88va; 100ra ዘቀዳም፡ fols. 90vb; 101vb ዘእሁድ፡ fol. 92rb ዘመርዓዊ፡ fol. 109rb ዘዘመነ፡ ኣስተርእዮ፡ fol. 111rb ዘመልከ፡ ጼዴቅ፡ fol. 112vb ዘቅዳሴ፡ fols. 115ra

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards covered by reddish brown tooled leather (remaining only on the inner face of the back board). Two pairs of sewing stations.
Two rows of small holes are visible on the spine fold of the quires.
Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather on the inner face of the back board (1 tool is used: double line fillet)

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

person.persName: haläqa Täfäri and haläqa Gǝrmay (s. Additio 1). Names of other individuals are mentioned in the supplication formulas: Gabra Māryām (e.g. 10ra, 43ra, 45va), ʾabuna Walda Mikāʾel (e.g. 13ra, 91rb, 99rb), Walatta Madḫǝn (e.g. 22va, 38vb, 55ra), Taʿǝka Śǝllāse (e.g. 25va, 29ra, 42vb), Walatta Takla Hāymānot (e.g. 32rb, 44ra, 69rb), Habta Mikāʾel (e.g. 34va, 37rb, 57vb), ʾabuna Gabra Śǝllāse (22va, 92rb, 96vb), Gabra ʾƎgziʾabǝḥer (31rb, 100ra), ʿĀmata ʿAbiyä ʾƎgziʾ (80vb, 98rb), Gabra Ḫǝywät (93rb, 103va).
